official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that all executive agencies should preferentially appoint veterans of the armed forces of the United States to positions in the Federal Government as provided in title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that executive agencies should preferentially appoint veterans to positions in the Federal Government as provided by law.
